author: Yaroslav Trofimov
title: Middle East Christians Fear Trump Ban Will Backfire - WSJ
text:
Middle East Christians Fear Trump Ban Will Backfire Order to help religious minorities fleeing persecution risks alienating Muslim neighbors, leaders say By YaroTrofimov Feb. 2, 2017 5:30 a.m. ET 
Few people are more distraught by President Donald Trump’s executive order barring citizens of seven Middle Eastern and African countries from the U.S. than the leaders of a community he said he seeks to help: the region’s Christians. 
Mr. Trump’s order, issued last Friday and aimed at preventing terrorist attacks on American soil, suspended travel from these Muslim-majority countries for at least 90 days. It also ordered a revamping... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
